companyInfo.Competitors: Ford Motor Company, General Motors, Toyota North America

jobDescription: Internship Duration: May 2018- August 2018The  Advanced UX Studio is located at the Future Center California in the heart of  Silicon Valley. Here, UX designers, researchers, technologists and  digitalization experts work hand in hand on the cars that will shape the future  of mobility. The intern’s role will be to contribute to our machine learning  and artificial intelligence capabilities and with always the user in mind.Contributing  to building our data collection and analytics infrastructureCreating  tools for analyzing and labeling datasetsCreating  machine learning algorithms and training models based on the dataTesting the  trained models on our test setsApproaching machine learning from a user  experience standpointQualifications:Must be enrolled at a University/College or Graduation date must be  within the last six monthsKnowledge in machine learning, computer programming languages (Python  and C )Preferred  majors: computer science, electrical engineering, data science, or any other  related field We  are proud to be an EEO employer M/F/D/V. We maintain a drug-free workplace and  perform pre-employment substance abuse testing.
